title: Hello, Everyone, Let’s Have A Week
content:

This week weâ€™re gonna have some videos of people doing stuff and also other internet about food and animals, weâ€™re gonna say mean things about Intuit, weâ€™re gonna quote Eli Cash, and maybe weâ€™ll do something about ice cream if yâ€™all want to because itâ€™s something about which I know a good amount.
